oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "I Hope the Company Appreciates All We've Been Doing For Them For the Past 16 Years!"
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fred Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Other Unions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Large Central States Board representative with money in his pockets directing others to produce rumors and lies to make the UE look bad.
